CustomField.formula: SUBSTITUTE( IF(INCLUDES( Account__r.Geographical_layout__c , "צפון"), "צפון, " , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Account__r.Geographical_layout__c , "מרכז"), "מרכז, " , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Account__r.Geographical_layout__c , "אזור ירושלים"), "אזור ירושלים, " , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Account__r.Geographical_layout__c , "דרום"), "דרום, " , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Account__r.Geographical_layout__c , "ארצי"), "ארצי, " , NULL)+ ".", ", .", "")
CustomField.label: Geographical layout f
